titleStmt.title: The Romane historie vvritten by T. Livius of Padua. Also, the Breviaries of L. Florus: with a chronologie to the whole historie: and the Topographie of Rome in old time. Translated out of Latine into English, by Philemon Holland, Doctor in Physicke
Ab urbe condita. English
titleStmt.author: Livy.

titleStmt.title: The Romane historie vvritten by T. Livius of Padua. Also, the Breviaries of L. Florus: with a chronologie to the whole historie: and the Topographie of Rome in old time. Translated out of Latine into English, by Philemon Holland, Doctor in Physicke
Ab urbe condita. English
titleStmt.author: Livy.
Florus, Lucius Annaeus. Epitomae de Tito Livio bellorum omnium annorum DCC libri II. English. Selections.
Marliani, Bartolomeo, d. 1560. Topographia antiquae Romae. English.
Holland, Philemon, 1552-1637.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Ad urbe condita.
"The topographie of Rome" is a revised translation of: Marliani, Bartolomeo. Topographia antiquae Romae.
The "Breviaries" are a translation of: Florus, Lucius Annaeus. Epitomae rerum Romanarum (for books 46-140 only).
The first word of the title is xylographic.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
